verses.verse: <S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1345>ordinances<s%> of divine <S%G2999>service,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> an <S%G2886>earthly<s%> <S%G39>sanctuary.<s%>

<S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2369>altar<s%> of <S%G2532>incense,<s%> and the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G4028>overlaid<s%> on all <S%G3840>sides<s%> with <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4713>pot<s%> <S%G2192>holding<s%> the <S%G3131>manna,<s%> <S%G2>Aaron<s%>'s <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4464>rod<s%> that <S%G985>budded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4109>tablets<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant;<s%>

<S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G5502>cherubim<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2683>overshadowing<s%> the mercy <S%G2435>seat,<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> things we <S%G2076>can't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G3313>detail.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> having <S%G2680>been<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2680>prepared,<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G1524>go<s%> <S%G3303>in<s%> <S%G1275>continually<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2005>accomplishing<s%> the <S%G2999>services,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> in the <S%G1763>year,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4374>offers<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for the <S%G51>errors<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

The <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G5124>is<s%> <S%G1213>indicating<s%> <S%G3598>this,<s%> that the way into the Holy <S%G39>Place<s%> <S%G5319>wasn't<s%> <S%G3380>yet<s%> <S%G5319>revealed<s%> while the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4714>standing;<s%>

<S%G3748>which<s%> is a <S%G3850>symbol<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> the <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G2540>age,<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3739%G99999>where<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> are <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G3361>that<s%> are <S%G1410>incapable,<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2596>concerning<s%> the <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> of <S%G5048>making<s%> the <S%G3000>worshipper<s%> <S%G5048>perfect;<s%>

being <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1909>(with<s%> <S%G1033>meats<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4188>drinks<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1313>various<s%> <S%G909>washings<s%>) <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4561>fleshly<s%> <S%G1345>ordinances,<s%> <S%G1945>imposed<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> a <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G1357>reformation.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> having <S%G3854>come<s%> as a high <S%G749>priest<s%> of the <S%G3195>coming<s%> good <S%G18>things,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3173>greater<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> more <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> that is to <S%G5123>say,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of <S%G5025>this<s%> <S%G2937>creation,<s%>

<S%G3761>nor<s%> yet <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3448>calves,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> entered <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for all <S%G1519>into<s%> the Holy <S%G39>Place,<s%> having <S%G2147>obtained<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3085>redemption.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5022>bulls,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4700>ashes<s%> of a <S%G1151>heifer<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkling<s%> those who have been <S%G2840>defiled,<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2514>cleanness<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

how <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G2511>will<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223>For<s%> this <S%G5124>reason<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G3704>since<s%> a <S%G2288>death<s%> has <S%G1096>occurred<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of the <S%G3847>transgressions<s%> that were <S%G1909>under<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> that those who have been <S%G2564>called<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> a last will and <S%G1242>testament<s%> <S%G2288>is,<s%> there must of necessity be the death of him who made <S%G5342>it.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> a <S%G1242>will<s%> is in <S%G949>force<s%> <S%G1909>where<s%> there has been <S%G3498>death,<s%> <S%G1893>for<s%> it <S%G2480>is<s%> <S%G3379>never<s%> in <S%G2480>force<s%> <S%G3753>while<s%> he who <S%G1303>made<s%> it <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
<S%G3606>Therefore<s%> even the <S%G4413>first<s%> covenant has <S%G3761>not<s%> been <S%G1457>dedicated<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2980>when<s%> <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> had been <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2992>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G3448>calves<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5131>goats,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G2053>wool<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> and <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> itself <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G846>people,<s%>
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>"This<s%> is the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1781>commanded<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>"

<S%G3668>Moreover<s%> he <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of the <S%G3009>ministry<s%> in the <S%G2532>same<s%> way with the <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G4975>nearly<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2511>is<s%> <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from shedding of <S%G130>blood<s%> there <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G859>remission.<s%>

It was necessary <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G318%G99999>that<s%> the <S%G5262>copies<s%> of the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> should be <S%G2511>cleansed<s%> with <S%G5125>these;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the heavenly <S%G2032>things<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G2378>with<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3778>these.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1525><s%> <S%G3756>hasn't<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> holy <S%G39>places<s%> made with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> which are <S%G499>representations<s%> of the <S%G228>true,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G846>itself,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> to <S%G1718>appear<s%> in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us;<s%>

nor <S%G3761>yet<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G4178>often,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1525>enters<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the holy <S%G39>place<s%> <S%G2596>year<s%> by <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> not his <S%G245>own,<s%>

or <S%G1893>else<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>ages,<s%> he has been <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> put <S%G115>away<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G846>himself.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2596><s%> Inasmuch <S%G3745>as<s%> it is <S%G606>appointed<s%> for <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G530>once,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%>

<S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4374>also,<s%> having been <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G399>bear<s%> the <S%G266>sins<s%> of <S%G4183>many,<s%> will <S%G3700>appear<s%> <S%G1537><s%> a second <S%G1208>time,<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> to those who are eagerly <S%G553>waiting<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
